ing: 1/2 cup cold milk, or more as needed
1 (1 ounce) package instant sugar-free pistachio pudding mix
1 cup frozen whipped topping (such as Cool WhipÂ®), thawed
des: "This pistachio frosting is creamy and delicious."
ins: Beat cream cheese in a bowl with an electric mixer until smooth and creamy, about 3 minutes. Gradually beat confectioners' sugar into cream cheese. Beat in pudding mix; add milk until desired consistency is reached. Fold in whipped topping.
